title: Triangle Strategy Review Round-Up - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.03.22
description:
Is Triangle Strategy the Nintendo Switch's next big thing? Greg and Tim dive into the reviews to find out!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:00 - Housekeeping

New Kinda Funny Podcast is up, it’s the sequel to me playing Puzzle Quest 3 with Mike!

The Roper Report  -

00:06:01 - Triangle Strategy Review Round-Up
00:17:00 - Elden Ring is the biggest non-FIFA or Call of Duty launch since Red Dead Redemption 2
00:24:09 - Ads
00:26:15 - CD Projekt vs Russia
00:29:00 - Sifu selling strong
00:36:35 - Haven Adds Same Sex Couples
00:39:22 - RUMOR MILL: Infamous and Sly in Development?!
00:52:11 - Out today
00:54:56 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Bless
